detail_desc: Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable foot straps with a metal buckle. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Sports jacket in soft fleece with contrasting colour trims and panels. Mesh-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped, mesh-lined front pockets.

Set with a skirt with straps in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a top in cotton jersey. Skirt with a print motif and appliqué on the front, an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with short, frilled sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back with reflective details.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back with reflective details.

Biker jacket in supple suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Chest pocket and side pockets with a zip, an open inner pocket, and a zip at the cuffs. Viscose lining.

Set with a plumeti blouse and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, short cap sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a sleeveless dress and sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Dress with decorative knot details at the top, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved shirts in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a metal buckle at the front. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a metal buckle at the front. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal rings at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.

Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and visible flatlock seams.
Blouse in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with shimmering gold button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed press-studs.
Blouse in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with shimmering gold button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed press-studs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with flounces. Elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, pile-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbed cuffs.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.

Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch, patterned weave made from a cotton blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Hole-patterned, scalloped trims around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Short, tiered skirt in a crinkled weave with smocking at the waist and a hole-embroidered hem. Lined.
Short, tiered skirt in a crinkled weave with smocking at the waist and a hole-embroidered hem. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in a cotton weave with flounces and embroidery. Sweetheart neckline, elasticated shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a low-cut back with wide, horizontal straps that tie in a bow at the back. Concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Cropped, V-neck top with a lace front, woven back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless top in satin with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a draped neckline and a double-layered top.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, chest pocket with a decorative button, and straight hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, chest pocket with a decorative button, and straight hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem.

Long dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with lace sections. Round neckline at the front, an open section at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
